author: dimitry8570
content: It asks you to calculate the basefee. Old version of geth doesn't support it and expects currentBaseFee in env.json

author: dimitry8570
content:
You can ask retesteth to calculate basefee if tool doesn't support it using flag in config

"calculateBasefee" : true,

author: dimitry8570
content: But there must be parentBaseFee in the env

author: dimitry8570
content: Which version of geth you use?
